title: Awesome
text: When I made my first purchase, I was very leery about this company. I hadn‚Äôt use them before none of my friends had used it, so I didn‚Äôt know if they were actually legitimate or not so I made a small purchase, and I received it rather quickly which surprised me, and the quality of the item was also, a very good quality. title: üö®READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING üö®
text:
Okay I LOVE Temu this app is 100% legit. My only thing I have to say is about Farmland and Fishland: I feel that when your closer to actually finally getting your items you make it impossible for people to, if you could make it a little easier for people (like myself) that would be great. For an example of this, I got down to 2 cents on farmland in Temu and it‚Äôs been taking me over a month to be able to get the products because of how difficult it is. üò•. ALSO I have noticed that you do free cash for PayPal. I have not tried this out yet for the very factor of not everyone has PayPal, if you could add more options like Venmo or Cash app that would be awesome! 

Thank you for reading my review and I hope you took the time to consider my review and will also take the time to reply. Thank you and have a marvelous day.

title: It‚Äôs fine but the promotions and scummy quality ruin it
text:
The products are fine and cheap, though some designs are questionable and I wouldn‚Äôt trust any of the electronics or things that you eat off of or something like earrings. Shipping is slow but it keeps you updated.

Now for the promotional stuff.. it is hot trash. They will say that you can get $200 for spinning this thing, but it‚Äôs actually $100 to your PayPal and another $100 in credit. Okay fine.

Then when they get you to build up to it, whatever reward or promotion you are doing, it will get progressively harder and harder to get to the payout. Things will start to give you less rewards so that finish line always seems to be close but never getting closer.

Then when you are at the final step, they will change the game on you. For the ‚Äúspin‚Äù game, you have $1 $2 $3 and $5 on the wheel. You try to get to $200 and by inviting friends you spin more. With $199 on the board, the wheel changed to now have $1, $2, $5 cash now, and $200 cash now.

My last spin landed on $5 cash now, where before it would have taken me to the finish with any of the other dollar amounts. I gave up and didn‚Äôt want to torture 3 new friends to get the coins yo spin with this creepy promotion that probably would have messed with me even more.

These crappy promotions are pushed on you everywhere and it‚Äôs a part of the whole experience. On top of the major concerns raised in the news on social media, I think this app is one to pass on.

title: Nice but
text:
Nice items on temu but with a flaw items maybe not as described. I have had 2 orders either damaged in shipping or just completely different the website like really. First order was 3 items toothbrush set, electric razor, apple accessories 5 in 1. Out of which electric raze came damaged due to poor packaging. Then used my credit since temu was out of items I added to fishland so it gave me options to get credit or select different items. So I did for wireless charger 2 in 1 and the forgot to mention it's not going to work and you will be able to use it since it's usb c and if you don't have wall adapter u wont be able to use it. I got invested from a friend to play fishland and I have already invited 8 friends and family. People said it's good to be true you get free items for reffer people. Now I know what you get and condition and or spammed with different offers. It's like cheap crap for really cheap price or should I say cheap garbage.

P.S: latest update you have to refer 20 people and place $200 order to get a free items and takes 2 months for $25 dollars in items. Not worth it.

title: 5 üåü All The Way
text: I have placed several orders with Temu now. And I have been totally satisfied with each order. All the items I have received have been top-of-the-line. They have been exactly as advertised. And the prices are absolutely incredible. I had a problem with only one item, and it was taken care of immediately and very satisfactorily. The only thing I would say, is as far as clothing goes, always check the size guide to find out what size you should order. All the clothing does not run the same size. 1X on one shirt may not be the same size as a 1X in another shirt. But as long as you check the size guide you should not have any problem. I have turned my friends on to Temu. And they have turned their friends on to Temu. And everyone is very very satisfied with Temu. So I would just say give it a try. I really think you‚Äôll be happy you did.

title: TEMU is addictively a great shopping experience
text: TEMU is a great value, fast shipping, and good costumer service. Great value for almost anything you are looking for, or not looking for, but found it and had to have it. Many of the cheapest items are still quite nice for the price. Just be sure to check reviews and read size descriptions carefully. Even without a review, you may decide that a few dollars is worth the risk. All my shipments have arrived very quickly. And the free shipping countdown always resets. Only one shipment arrived late (I think by only a day) and I got an automatic credit of $5. Only about 2% of my items arrived damaged. I got easy credits for those too. The coupon and reward parts are not so great. Unless all your friends are shopping addicts, it is not worth spamming your mailing list for a discount for items that are already rock bottom prices.

title: So far so good!
text: I was a little skeptical of this app, but my sister had ordered something off of it and it turned out good so I gave it a try. Made 3 orders over the course of 4 days, and everything shipped together and arrived together 10 days after the last order. It all did come from China, but I‚Äôd say 10 days isn‚Äôt that bad. They also give your account a credit of $5 if the items show up late. I was extremely happy with everything I ordered, for the price it‚Äôs hard to complain. I guess if I did have to complain I would say it was kind of weird how everything I ordered just seemed to be thrown with no rhyme or reason in a bag together, that was then taped up. This of course meant that a lot of the packaging and boxes that the items came in were kinda bent and dinged up, but honestly that wasn‚Äôt a problem for me. Overall I‚Äôm happy with my purchases and I‚Äôll very likely be ordering from Temu again.

title: BEWARE! ITS CHINESE MADE CRAP!
text:
Well, I‚Äôll try to make my review short and sweet and cut right to the chase! I was sucked in to their world class advertising scams, and I regret it to this day! When I finally received the items I purchased, I was shocked to see the way it was packaged. Everything was wrapped in a paper ball secured by packing tape. I wish I had taken pictures! I was Immediately alarmed on what I should expect, and I wasn‚Äôt even shocked at what I saw! Everything and I do mean everything I bought look like things you would win in a carnival. Sheep plastic garbage so bad that I couldn‚Äôt find anyone that wanted it or any of it. So I laid each item out in a row on the pic shelter for the homeless thinking someone may like to have it or some of it or just one of it. 

The next day I went back and everything was still there had been moved around, played with etc. etc. etc. and so forth, but nothing was taken. People it‚Äôs that bad and I‚Äôm not exaggerating in the least little bit so beware!  If Chinese crap is what you want, then you‚Äôre at the right place and that‚Äôs all I needed to say!

title: Fun and unusual gifts
text: I can always find that special little unusual gift on this app. Really great prices and of my multiple purchases I have only found one item that was not as expected and not worth the money. You will find that in the category of items I have purchased that the prices are probably 60-80% less that purchasing at brick and mortar stores or on the web. As an example I bought a Beauty and the Beast, Belle, dress for approximately $16 on Temu and what appeared to be the exact same style dress at Disneyland for $120.  The material and craftsmanship appeared the same also.  Generally speaking most of my purchases are dresses for 4-10yo girls and every item is well made, nice fabric, good fitting and exactly as shown on the app. Delivery is about 7-10 days and shipping has always been free. I recommend this app to all my friends and family and now I recommend it to you!!

title: Amazing
text: You‚Äôll save so much as long as you don‚Äôt mind waiting a few days for delivery. Company has great reputation. If anything arrives damaged or wrong size Temu will issue a refund & thus far I‚Äôve never had to go thru trouble of being asked to return anything. Temu trust it‚Äôs customer. You‚Äôll really save on things like underwear & shoes. You‚Äôll find cool stuff @ great prices you‚Äôre familiar with & interesting things you‚Äôve never heard of but can‚Äôt live without. I especially love the pet supply section & the charge boxes for cell phones. Anything for a cell phone is much better priced here. Phone cases too. Many of the cases/products are the exact same as what‚Äôs on Amazon‚Ä¶except the price is always much better. If they are 1 day late on delivery they‚Äôll issue a $5 credit & do so without asking. I‚Äôm cheap & Im always excited to have a package arrive one day late. 5 stars plus!

title: Wonderful Bargains
text: I have been buying from Temu for the last three months. At first I was skeptic so I one bought one pretty little dress for my great granddaughter . Well it arrived in about 10 days and looked just like the  one advertised . Really pretty and good quality. So then I ordered a larger order of baby clothes,baby rattles and stuffed toys. Everything was good except one outfit. It was cute but I didn't like the fabric . No problem . I-was given a choice to get an instant credit or be refunded to my credit card . I took the credit to use on my next purchase as I already had selected items. The return was easy . Print a label, put it in a mailing bag, attach label and drop at UPS. Since then I have enjoyed  shopping on the Temu site! So much to choose from! I will continue to use them for many different items! Good quality! Good prices! Great customer service!

title: Great products
text: Temu products are, for the most part, high quality products. I have ordered many times from Temu, well over 100 products and so far only a handful of items were low quality. I have found so many great items to give as gifts and do not feel that it is cheap gifts but rather good quality and cute. I am quite impressed with the clothing items, especially the sweaters. I just ordered 3 more sweaters and can‚Äôt wait to wear them. My husband wore Temu shoes on vacation and they held up great on very long walks, not waterproof, but comfortable. He enjoys some of the electronics as well, especially the Bluetooth ear piece for phone calls and podcasts. I purchased a lot of stationary for my classroom and gifts for my students and I love every piece of stationary. Everyone also love my classroom with all the cute stationary everywhere! I highly recommend Temu.

title: Customer service is not great
text: Even though customer service is 24/7. Temu takes a long time to respond after getting a hold of someone. I had a problem with Usps shipping my package to the wrong address. I‚Äôve checked the address I‚Äôve had down and checked where it actually got shipped to. It was sent to a totally different state. I messaged Temu and they took forever to respond. Once they acknowledged my problem they told me they cannot do anything about it and said to contact Usps to get the package back and if I don‚Äôt get it then contact the sellers for a refund. Usps have delivered it to a persons front porch so there‚Äôs no way I‚Äôm getting my package. And of  course I had to message the four sellers I bought from. And two out of the four didn‚Äôt understand. One of them said I have to talk to logistics and I already did. The other eventually understood and so three out of the four sellers that understood said they will refund but who knows if it‚Äôll actually be refunded. The reason I went to buy from Temu is because an influencer I follow on TikTok raved about it. And the items she had on were cute.

title: Exceptional Experience with TEMU
text:
I have been a dedicated user of TEMU‚Äôs apps for some time now, and I must express my profound satisfaction with the overall experience. From the impeccable quality to the lightning-fast delivery, every aspect has exceeded my expectations.

One of the standout features has been the unparalleled customer service. The team‚Äôs kindness and responsiveness have truly set a new standard. On the rare occasions when I‚Äôve made purchases that turned out to be too large, TEMU‚Äôs prompt refund process has been a welcome surprise. What‚Äôs even more impressive is that sometimes, there‚Äôs no need for a return, showcasing a level of trust and understanding that is truly remarkable.

TEMU, you have created something truly special. Your commitment to excellence is evident in every interaction. Please continue this outstanding work. You‚Äôve won a customer for life.

title: Buying Products on Temu
text: This site, I Absolutely Love! It is a Very Well Trusted Site!!! unlike some sites out there, that you have to be very careful of. Whenever I buy any products on this site, and I have Bought A lot of,  I Always hit the ‚Äú track and updates ‚Äú because they are so Accurate and Honest and they ALWAYS keep you updated on where your product is and when it will be delivered. title: TEMU as a whole
text: I have been ordering from TEMU for about 9 months now. I have never had any issues with receiving product. It won‚Äôt hurt to give TEMU a try. I do feel like a millionaire lol

title: My Temu review
text: I have heard some pretty scary things about this site but I have not experienced any such things myself thus far. I have been 95% satisfied with my purchases so far. title: Not worth the time
text: i downloaded this app to help out my cousin for referrals on free items, and thought ‚Äúwhy not try for myself?‚Äù i‚Äôve been playing the fish land game on the app to get a free item. i‚Äôve invited 6 people to the app which awards me 200 pts each. i‚Äôm literally at 99.7% to getting the free item and this stupid app makes it so impossible to get anything for free. the fish started going up by .01% the second i hit 99% bc the company knows that i‚Äôm about to get a free item. plus, other things like the wheel spins are bogus too. i‚Äôve done one 5 different times and each time it goes in the exact same order of prizes given. it‚Äôs automated to make you lose. it‚Äôs really not worth the time & idk how anyone has been able to get free stuff off this app but it seems like the company will trick you and waste your time no matter what you do. if i don‚Äôt get my free item after 6 referrals & checking back every single day for my points then i‚Äôm deleting the app and probably going to make sure everyone knows how crappy it is.

title: Favorite
text: I have been shopping at Temu now for a little less than a year so far I have only had a few things that I have ordered that I was disappointed with, but they didn‚Äôt cost me that much so I didn‚Äôt lose any money. I will say I have never had a charge on my account from Temu that didn‚Äôt match what I paid I have never had any worries of them taking my information. There are many different ways to pay with Temu so that is it is safe for you to use your card, I have found the most interesting things on this website at a very cheap price shipping for me usually takes about a week to a week and a half and it does come from overseas so you have to expect that it‚Äôs going to take longer for you to receive it other than that I have enjoyed my shopping experience on Temu and expect to continue shopping

title: EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED WITH MY RECENT ORDER FROM TEMU!!!
text: With all of the purchases I‚Äôve made with TEMU, there‚Äôs only been one rather LARGE problem, which was caused by the local Post Office. Our neighborhood is undergoing some MAJOR street construction, so the postal carrier is having to walk part of his normal route. Unfortunately, on October 19, he scanned my TEMU package at 5:19 PM as having been delivered to my porch, but then inadvertently hand-delivered it to another house down the street. Although they have attempted to convince the neighbors to return the package to the USPO so it may be delivered to me, the neighbor refuses to do so, leaving me without my TEMU products. This is VERY DISAPPOINTING because I was greatly anticipating the items in that order. Sadly, NEITHER the U.S. Postal Service nor TEMU will accept responsibility, so I am left without my order OR the money I paid for same. I‚ÄôM EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED IN THIS, BECAUSE UNTIL THIS ORDER, THE SERVICE HAS BEEN VERY GOOD AND ON-TIME. IT IS A SHAME THAT NO ONE IS WILLING TO ACCEPT RESPONSIBILITY AND EITHER REFUND MY MONEY OR RESEND MY ORDER!!! I AM NOT SURE IF I CAN TRUST TEMU TO PROTECT ME IN THE FUTURE SHOULD MY PACKAGES AGAIN BE LOST OR MISPLACED. I AM TERRIBLY DISAPPOINTED!!

title: Love love love!!
text: I shop this app often and everything I‚Äôve purchased has been awesome! Typically items on these apps are cheaply made and fall apart easily but not one item I‚Äôve purchased has been cheaply made or falls apart!! The makeup is wonderful! Never clogged pores or causes a breakout. Just read reviews before making a purchase. Clothing isn‚Äôt Macys quality of course but its nicely made and holds up in the wash. Plus you cant beat the price especially if it‚Äôs for a one time wear dress or shirt. My daughter is 16 and loves their jewelry and sunglasses. We‚Äôve purchased several dresses for events and they always fit great. Be sure to check the size chart before you order. Some of their sizing is different usually just need to size up a little if anything. I‚Äôve gotten small electronics such as ‚ÄúAirPods‚Äù for my 7 year old and it‚Äôs all legit items! I give TEMU 2 thumbs up!! üëçüèªüëçüèª

title: Addicting App
text:
I have never really been one to do a lot of shopping online due to me being the type of person that likes to actually see and feel a product to ensure it‚Äôs what I‚Äôm looking for before purchasing. I also hate waiting for shipping!

But I had heard a lot of good things about Temu and figured I would give it a chance. I started of buying a couple cheap items just in case it wasn‚Äôt real or the products weren‚Äôt good. I was so pleased at the fast shipping, the updates about the shipping and the quality of the items I ordered. Now I find myself on the App every day (sometimes just looking) and have since made 3 more purchases within a 2 week period. 

If you‚Äôre on the fence about Temu, start with a small order like I did. You won‚Äôt be sorry! Just read the reviews (like you would for any other app like this)

title: Best website ever!
text: I absolutely love this website.  When I first saw it I thought it would b just like the old "Wish"....I could no have been more wrong.  You don't have to wait for months to receive your items, you usually get your stuff within a week and a half.  You get a $5 credit if you don't get it in the time frame they give you.  I have never had to return anything because everything has been perfect.  The prices are inexpensive and the products look expensive.  I have NOT ordered any clothes at this time.  I make wreaths and the silk flowers are gorgeous.  Th other craft items have not disappointed at all.  My first order was a small one and was on like a $10 order to make sure the merchandise was acceptable.  I was so thrilled it was all exactly as described!  I am so glad that I found this site!  You will too!!!!

title: TEMU IS ANNOYINGü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
text: I seriously don‚Äôt write reviews for apps normally but I have to write one for Temu because lord it has so many problems and is mad annoying when it comes to claiming you‚Äôre money or getting it however you‚Äôd wanna put it ‚úãüèæ so I got Temu because I heard of it from my sister who said she‚Äôd gotten 30$ so I decided I‚Äôd get it !.  Because that would be easy or so I THOUGHT, the first problem is when u have Temu they obviously give u the biggest amount of money to get you hyped up and let you start but than you have to invite multiple people just to get numerous spins or coins and they give u a freaking invitation limit and a limit for how many users who‚Äôve already downloaded the app and it‚Äôs annoying because I can‚Äôt invite that many people who haven‚Äôt used the appüíÄü§®üôÑ , and than it resets the amount u have after abt a day or 2 because they expect u to get it that easily ???! title: Wrong shipping, hard to ask ship again
text: I introduced Temu to my whole family and all my friends. It‚Äôs shipping is fast. And quality was good according to the price. Their shipping is far more faster than AliExpress. I was very satisfied with Temu until I received a wrong package. I had about 5 orders in that package and when I got it EVERYTHING was WRONG! I wasn‚Äôt even mad at it at the beginning because I knew mistakes could happened. I contacted customer service and they were very nice at first saying they would sent a correct package. Then they assigned someone to ‚Äútake care‚Äù of my case. Then the problem came, they ask me to send the wrong package back and said they would ‚Äúinspect ‚Äú the returned package before they could send me the right one!!!! When they made a mistake I am the one get to blame and ‚Äúinvestigate ‚Äú?! I returned the package and try to follow up. The agent NEVER replied my message anymore. They looked like disappeared. I am so disappointed with that attitude. GOOD BuY Temu !

title: Better than SHEIN
text: Overall, I am quite happy with Temu. The majority of the items I have purchased have been delivered in a very timely manner. I have only had one issue in early March with a package that took a month to arrive. However, they had given me five dollar credit for each of the packages that were delayed. The quality of the products is pretty good, I will say that some items are way smaller than I thought they were going to be.  I am not talking about clothing, but nail art supplies. The nail polish bottles are very tiny and possibly will give you two manicures tops, but for the price the products are still pretty good quality clothing I have purchased is true to size and I absolutely adore all of the pajamas that I have purchased. Compared to SHEIN I believe the products are better quality and you get them much much faster. I also think that the price point at Temu is better than it‚Äôs competitor.

title: Love Temu!
text:
I love Temu! Have been a customer for well over a year and so far have been very pleased with the items that I have bought. I love their dedication to store quality items and depending on what that may be many are of better quality. I have no complaints! They ship in a timely manner and I have never had any issues with delivery or anything. 
If you are on the fence with purchasing from them for fear of using your CC or the quality of merchandise don't be. Although it's cheaper than bigger places online sell for it is basically the same things but sold at cheaper prices. Basically you get what you pay for. Read the reviews on the things you want to buy to know the quality so you know exactly what you're getting. Again, I love Temu and have been satisfied with everything thus far.
Thank you, Temu!

title: ‚ÄúGames‚Äù are meh
text:
I like the products and everything else. The app works fine. But those constant spam ‚Äúwins‚Äù and messages. I get that it‚Äôs to keep making you come back, but it‚Äôs just a gross feeling. Now, the fish/farm game are just awful. You‚Äôll start off thinking you have a chance. But as you get close to what you thought was the end, you just started. lol

Basically fish food becomes worth .01% per feeding. And when you do finally finish one, they‚Äôre not even worth half a cent. I‚Äôve been at it for nearly a month. The worst of it is as you try to play the ‚Äúgame‚Äù, you‚Äôre bombarded with goofy messages about winning stuff. Which pushes you back into the store. That one min half off to feed the fish? Nah. You‚Äôll get smacked with more pop ups that run your time out before you can make any use of it. 

It‚Äôs basically if you took your entire junk mail folder+every spam call you had last week and tried to make it into a game somehow.

title: Shopping made fun!
text:
I gotta say, I was pleasantly surprised by my experience on the Temu shopping app! I had heard some negative feedback from my friends, so I wasn't sure what to expect. But let me tell you, I had a blast shopping on this app!

First of all, the user interface is super user-friendly and easy to navigate. I didn't have any trouble finding what I was looking for. The app also has a wide variety of products available, from fashion to electronics to home d√©cor - you name it, they've got it!

One thing that stood out to me was the amazing deals and discounts they offer. I managed to snag some incredible bargains that I probably wouldn't have found elsewhere. Plus, the app sends notifications about flash sales and exclusive offers, so you never miss out on a great deal.

What really impressed me though was the fast and efficient delivery service. I got my items delivered right to my doorstep within a few days, which was super convenient. And if I had any issues or questions, the customer support team was always ready to assist me in a friendly and helpful manner.

Overall, I've had a fantastic experience shopping on the Temu app. Don't let the negative reviews deter you - give it a try yourself! I'm sure you'll enjoy it just as much as I did. Happy shopping!

title: Pop ups are out of control
text: The amount of pop ups there are are extremely obnoxious. At first I didn‚Äôt mind it‚ÄîI knew what I was signing up for when I got the app and I‚Äôm not the type to get angry about pop ups that I can just take a few seconds to exit out of anyway‚Äîbut now they‚Äôre even more excessive than they once were and it irritates me because it doesn‚Äôt make any sense. More than half the time when I get them I‚Äôm already about to purchase something and the constant pop ups make it more difficult for me to get to the point of making my purchase. I‚Äôve given up and just closed out of the app on several occasions before making a purchase and decided to get products elsewhere literally just because of how many pop ups there are. Temu should learn not to make it so difficult for their customers to buy their products by putting yet another phony offer to get all products free on the screen.

title: Annoyed
text: While the app has so many good reasonably priced things. I hate all the fake mumbo jumbo stuff about getting free gifts. So we had one $100 coupon but we were at $80 so we had to get the remaining $20 by sending invites to people. And for every person that makes an account it gives you money towards the remaining balance. First person $10 so i was at $10 next person $5. Then the next person was $2 then the next $1. I had $2 balance left and had no people left to invite because they were at .40 cents then .20 cents. So it takes you like 10 ppl for the last remaining $2 cus every new person is worth less and less. And they do that with every ‚Äúfree gift‚Äù i know no more people and if you‚Äôve sent it to people who‚Äôve had the app previously downloaded it won‚Äôt count for them. Like it‚Äôs pointless. And the amount of pop ups that come out are insane! Decent stuff but this app and all the fake tricks that they try are annoying!

title: Get items but scam if free
text:
First, I should say that everything I have ordered is exactly what I got. No complaints about that. Some stuff is much smaller than expected though. And some stuff the quality isn‚Äôt there. But I have gotten jeans for 5$ where they were perfect so it just depends. 
The issue is if you want to indulge in any of their ‚Äúfree‚Äù stuff. And don‚Äôt get me wrong, If you do win anything free, it DOES come. But it‚Äôs next to impossible. I‚Äôve been trying Fishland for a while now. U have to raise about 6 fish in 6/7 days for the gift. I‚Äôve went EVERY day to get fish food. I‚Äôve shared to some friends, I even spend 15$ on items for it to give you 200g of food. Yet I can‚Äôt raise the fish. Because in the beginning they have it where when you feed it, it goes up like 10% or so. But once you‚Äôre on your last fish, it only goes up .15% making this impossible. Honestly it‚Äôs ridiculous because unless u post and post and are an influencer, you get nothing but 10% off coupons but max 3$ off. C‚Äômon now. What a scam

title: Get the clothes!
text:
Most of the gadgets and household items have let me down but the clothes and on this site always come JUST as the photo shows. Always in great condition folded in it‚Äôs own zipped bag and great material. Also if you review an item and say you are unhappy and give it a low rating they make it possible right there to return it. I haven‚Äôt received the makeup I ordered yet but I watched a person review their makeup and it looked good! I got a Naked Pallet for about 7$!!! I‚Äôll certainly review once I get it as I review every item because I find reviews really helpful for me. This is a legit site people! As it being ‚ÄúFast Fashion‚Äù always use your conscience and let‚Äôs hope this isn‚Äôt a horrible sweat shop situation and start getting tags that say HELP on them like with Shein! But my research hasn‚Äôt shown me anything bad YET. Get those deals people! 
Michelle

title: Not a scam
text: I love this Temu app. I have bought several things and have been satisfied with everything my first purchase was a silicone doll for my daughters birthday it arrived a week before and I was a nervous wreck waiting to receive it because others I had purchased for her in the past were not what I ordered and for the price It was I just prayed I didn‚Äôt get scammed the doll was exactly what it was supposed to be. It is so lifelike it‚Äôs almost scary she loves it. I FaceTimed a friend and her mom thought it was real. The delivery is exactly when it says it is other than one I had to arrive a day late and they gave me a $5 credit. I‚Äôve read things on internet some say it‚Äôs a scam others say it‚Äôs not. I‚Äôm here to tell you it‚Äôs not. This app is a must have in your life if you don‚Äôt already have it. I hope anyone reading this enjoys this app as much as I do.

title: Temu
text: This app is 100% true, everything I order usually arrives around the date it lists in the app one of my orders actually arrived one day earlier than it was exposed to, which I think everyone would be happy over. Everything came exactly how it was supposed to, all the hoodies I bought were the correct size, the AirPods, I bought actually work and sound amazing through music. bracelets and charm bracelets I got are perfect fit and beautiful exactly how they listed when you go to buy them. I will definitely be buying more stuff from this app, whenever I opened the app on my first day I got 80% off everything, so all the hoodies I bought all the bracelets I bought even the AirPods, all only costed $15, which is pretty cheap for five things so I will definitely be using this app again in the future, and this app is amazing.

title: Sketchy games
text: So I didn‚Äôt want to buy something of the site unless I tried something first so I decided to go along and play their spin the wheel games. So I did win (a dress, car lights, and phone case). But to get them you have to invite and harass, your whole family and some friends! Lol. It‚Äôs shady to me because they tell you to send invite to NEW USER AND WIN, I did and they gave me 10 cents taken off the remainder! So I invited 3 more people and the same. So to get rid of the remaining $1.70 how many NEW USERS would I have to add? You do the math. You‚Äôll win‚Ä¶. If you invite the world, they join and play the game once. As for the products I won, they were good Chinese quality  stuff. I figure everything we buy here in USA is made in China so these things are the same we buy at the store except not branded. My son in law got earphones identical to the AirPods and they sound the exact same. So the app is good not great and the winning is possible but you gotta invite the WORLD.

title: Great Find!
text: Temu is MOSTLY a great app but the sizes vary from what the pictures show ( a lot)- I‚Äôd suggest going 2 sizes UP on rings though. It does usually take about 2 weeks to receive your packages and if it‚Äôs late, they will give you a $5 bonus ( I‚Äôve gotten a couple of them). I‚Äôd suggest trying out lights and ANY electronics AS SOON AS you receive them‚Äî note: they are really quick about refunds (IF it goes to your Temu account) but deposit back to cards takes awhile. I wouldn‚Äôt waste my time in the games to earn free gifts‚Äî UNLESS you‚Äôre making several LARGE purchases. It‚Äôs nearly impossible. I order from them ALL THE TIME and still havent earned ANYTHING Free. ü§¨ Btw, don‚Äôt waste your time ‚Äúfeeding fish‚Äù because EVERY TIME I get close, I suddenly run out of time. Just THIS MORNING (like LITERALLY just 2 minutes ago) I went to play and I had OVER 20 HOURS Disappear and it was counting down the supposed Last 5 seconds!!!üôÑüò≥ü§Øüò°ü§¨

title: My to go store
text:
Temu is very consumer friendly, Especially with the inflation going on. At first , I‚Äôm kinda hesitant to order something here coz I‚Äôm used to AliExpress, or SHEIN, ROMWE , but I‚Äôm glad I give it a try. They have very affordable products but good quality items that are more pricey in other store . They have a lot of cute, unique stuffs that you don‚Äôt usually see or can buy here in USA. The shipping speed is great, in my experience the longest time I waited is 2 weeks, 1 week is the fastest and they will give you $5+ credit if your order didn‚Äôt arrive on time. 
Returning item is not hard , they will refund your money on the spot. I once returned a shoes coz it‚Äôs too big for me and you can just  drop the item in USPS or UPS with the label they provided. And they really notify you if items you‚Äôre interested in is back on stock. 
Overall, TEMU is great üòä‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

title: Such a good app
text: The items are so cheap but such good quality. I‚Äôve bought stuff from Temu a couple times now and I‚Äôve been happy with every purchase I‚Äôve made. I thought the shipping would take forever since I‚Äôve used Romwe and Shein in the past and my packages ordered from them took almost a month each time, but when I order from Temu it only takes a week, which is amazing. I was skeptical bout ordering from Temu at first but I‚Äôm so happy I did because it‚Äôs rlly worth it.  However, the only downfall to Temu is the games in it.  I‚Äôve managed to win from the Fishland game once but it wasn‚Äôt easy.  The games are made to be played the exact way each time, so u can‚Äôt just get lucky and win since the game is set up to make u invite more and more people in order to almost win anything.  Despite all that though, I still love this app.

title: Cheap and Legit
text: Like any other website that sells products through vendors, you're suscpetible to get scammed if you don't check reviews and store information. This is common sense. I've made countless orders on Temu, receive them quicker than I do on Aliexpress/Alibaba, and is cheaper. Not only do they provide you $5 if the order is late, but you are subject to a price adjustment if a store increases their price within 30 days after your order, which is amazing because theyre protecting you from vendors trying to lowball you!!! As with any order online, it's a risk for your account/info to get compromised or hacked, but that's a risk we all take making any purchase online. Not sure why people say this is a scam, I've received all my orders and have never had an issue. Of course, always remember, you will get what you pay for.

title: I am having fun with this app.
text: Lots of things to choose from and a fun shopping experience right from your bed. Things are inexpensive and ship for free. There are a little coupons and price reductions that are nice. Everything ships from China, but happens a lot faster than you would expect. I have been pleased with everything I ordered which has included jewelry making equipment to clothing. The only negative is getting so many alerts on my phone, but I can adjust that. I also get a lot of texts every single day about sales and I can also unsubscribe from those text messages or you can choose to ignore, obviously, those texts. Overall safe, easy to use, and I guess there are games you can play to win items but I‚Äôve not done that yet. I have had no problem with glitching or inaccuracies.

title: Only one problem so far
text:
Everyone said this app was a scam and just like other things it‚Äôs not!! I pay through my PayPal I have received everything I have purchased or I receive credits for missing items so far just one package unaccounted for that says delivered and I‚Äôve yet to receive a valid response or credit for üòñ 
Other than that I have received every other package or credit for missing or broken items and I‚Äôve also won and received 4 free gifts from the games! They take longer than packages but they do arrive and 100% free just by playing the games and sending referrals. Aside from one package not received of the many I‚Äôve ordered it‚Äôs a good super cheap app it‚Äôd be 5 stars if I‚Äôd have received credit or a re shipment of the items in the package not received but it‚Äôs been like 4 days and I haven‚Äôt received a valid response ü§∑üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è so maybe the gifts aren‚Äôt really free idk

title: Temu
text: It‚Äôs a great site and I love the product for the most parts but I honestly feel that majority of the ‚Äúfree‚Äù stuff isn‚Äôt free or you have to do days of activities just for them to continue to cheat you in the game or activities you‚Äôre doing so ultimately you will end up having to pay for something they claimed you get for free after 2 weeks of telling you it‚Äôs a gift (None of the gifts have worked for me) and last but not least Fishland it‚Äôs a game within the app I‚Äôve been playing it since I‚Äôve downloaded the app in hopes of receiving just two free gifts and after a week of playing I notice that some of my invitations never sent out they constantly reduced my fish dispense amount and my ‚Äúfish payout‚Äù from 5 Cents to 2 Cents so I‚Äôve been playing for about a month and have yet to clear a 0.25 charge smh so most games and gifts aren‚Äôt real but it does have great product and reviews

title: Check your total before you pay
text:
With your first order everything will be really cheap. Don‚Äôt expect the same discount for your subsequent purchases. Order takes about 2 -3 weeks to come. Some items are really good  and worth the price but some are just  crap. You get what you pay for basically. With how cheap everything is you can‚Äôt really expect good quality. It‚Äôs kinda like shopping at the dollar store. Shipping is free with 10 dollar purchase. 
They are so aggressive with marketing. I probably get a minimum of 5 e-mail  from them everyday. Thank God I didn‚Äôt subscribe with the text messaging. Now regarding the free gifts, you‚Äôll only get them if you can get other people to sign up. My issue now with Temu is the pricing. When you look at the cart everything is itemized but if you add it yourself the total just don‚Äôt add up. I think they were counting on people not checking and just paying whatever they charge, don‚Äôt get me started on costumer support it‚Äôs pretty much non existent.

title: Temu Shocked me!
text:
I must say that I‚Äôm quite surprised and pleased with most of what I‚Äôve ordered on Temu! I just discovered this website and thought to myself, this has got to be bull$&@t! Lol prices this low???! Merchandise and items that look this great on the website is probably crap when you get it home?! lol 
Well, absolutely just the opposite! Yeah, we shoppers will always experience some bad deals anywhere at any time! I‚Äôm sure even in here as I‚Äôve heard. Be to be honest, no company can please anyone all of the time! That‚Äôs why you have customer service, support and management! I can truly say that so far I‚Äôve been quite pleased and impressed with what I‚Äôve ordered! And I‚Äôve ordered quite a bit!  This makes me now a true loyal customer an fan! Yesss! I‚Äôll recommend Temu to family and friends! I already have!! lol ‚ù§Ô∏èüíØüòÇüëègreat job! Temu!

title: Great products and pricing
text: I live shopping on Temu. They have so many unique and awesome items. I have purchased a little of everything from them. Clothing, electronics, kitchen gadgets, makeup, and even home decor. All of which have been delivered a lot faster than their competitors. No waiting a month to get something. And it‚Äôs packaged together and nicely. No random package wrapped in packing tape that looks suspect. It‚Äôs in a Temu branded package and shipped with legit tracking from the shipping agent. The items are always as described and in some cases even better than they appeared in the ads. I will continue to shop here and promote them to all my friends and family. The Holidays are coming up and I def will be using them to fulfill my shopping list and I will be adding some things to my ‚Äúwant‚Äù list from Temu as well. Overall they are great!

title: bad app/scam
text: This is a horrible app! A lot of these reviews are fake please just take 2-3 minutes out of your day to listen to this. I ordered around 20 things off temu. The packaging came BROKEN and I ordered a pencil bag for my daughter's school and it came broken. I ordered a poster for my son's room and it came bent and torn. Many people's information is getting sold to the dark web unless you have a REALLY strong and protective card I do not recommend this app. Just warning you about this app. Mind you not even all of my stuff came in and most of it came broken. I would recommend researching the parent company which has been removed for selling users' information on the dark web Currently Temu is going through the same issue. The reason you see so many amazing reviews is just all bots, if you read the names some of them are just scribbles like ‚Äúeiabcoe‚Äù ‚Äújsixipqhx‚Äù ‚Äúqwufbx‚Äù etc or they are names that are in China. Don't listen to the positive reviews unless you want to get scammed. Thank you for reading and I hope you don't buy anything off Temu.
